nodes.text: A drag course used for Podracing existed on the Mid Rim planet of Malastare during the year 32 BBY. The course had a rocky surface, and contained several sharp turns and long straightaways, the latter which served as good opportunities for pilots to use their thrusters. The track also moved through a sizable methane lake, which was covered in a green haze. The Vulptereen pilot Dud Bolt was favored here, and would race against other pilots using his Vulptereen 327 Podracer.
The course first appeared, unnamed, in the 1999 Gameboy Color video game Star Wars Episode I: Racer. It was one of five courses available at the start of the game.
